# [**Mapas de Calor**]{style="font-size:8pt"}

::: panel-tabset



### [**Tejupilco**]{style="color:#990000"}

```{r heatmap_tejupilco}
z <- z |>
    dplyr::filter(accuracy != "locality")
densnv::mp_heatmap(geocoded_dataset = z,
                   cve_edo = "15",
                   locality = "Tejupilco de Hidalgo",
                   status_caso = c(1, 2),
                   kernel = 1200,
                   week = c(1:53),
                   zoom = NULL,
                   map_type = NULL,
                   alpha = 0.6,
                   static = FALSE,
                    save = FALSE,
                   palette = viridis::turbo)
```
